activities:
1. Personal Information Received From the European Union: Bottomline Technologies has offices in the U.K., France, Germany, Switzerland and the Netherlands. We receive employee and customer information from our subsidiary offices in Europe for business purposes. 
 
2. Bottomline’s Paymode-X settlement network receives purchasing, invoicing and payments processing data from customers located in Europe. This data may include personal information.

Our Safe Harbor policy can be found: 
http://www.bottomline.com/legal_privacy/safeharbor.html
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data, Financial services and payment processing data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
